mapper.sql: id, src, dst, dstType, readId, content, contentType, fileName, fileSize, fileDuration, isValid, sendTime, receiveTime, createTime, updateTime
mapper.select:
select
from t_message where isValid=1 and src=#{groupUserId} and dst=#{groupId} and dstType="group" order by sendTime desc limit #{start},#{end}

select
from ( select
from t_message where isValid=1 and src=#{src} and dst=#{dst} and dstType="single" and contentType=#{fileType} union all select
from t_message where isValid=1 and src=#{dst} and dst=#{src} and dstType="single" and contentType=#{fileType}) t order by sendTime desc limit #{start},#{end}

select
from ( select
from t_message where isValid=1 and src=#{src} and dst=#{dst} and dstType="single" and sendTime>=#{date} union all select
from t_message where isValid=1 and src=#{dst} and dst=#{src} and dstType="single" and sendTime>=#{date}) t order by sendTime limit #{start},#{end}

select
from ( select
from t_message where isValid=1 and src=#{src} and dst=#{dst} and dstType="single" and sendTime>=#{date} union all select
from t_message where isValid=1 and src=#{dst} and dst=#{src} and dstType="single" and sendTime<=#{date}) t order by sendTime desc limit #{start},#{end}

select
from ( select
from t_message where isValid=1 and src=#{src} and dst=#{dst} and dstType="single" and content like #{content} union all select
from t_message where isValid=1 and src=#{dst} and dst=#{src} and dstType="single" and fileName like #{content}) t order by sendTime desc limit #{start},#{end}

select
from ( select
from t_message where isValid=1 and dst=#{dst} and dstType="group" and content like #{content} union all select
from t_message where isValid=1 and dst=#{dst} and dstType="group" and fileName like #{content}) t order by sendTime desc limit #{start},#{end}

mapper.update:
update t_message
src = #{src,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dst = #{dst,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dstType = #{dsttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
readId = #{readid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contentType = #{contenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
